entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High 17. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
